title: WTB PSA Johnny Bates and Frank Bowerman
author: Rayl

posts.post_title: WTB PSA Johnny Bates and Frank Bowerman
posts.post_content:
Need these two to complete my Boston Doves team set. I am looking for PSA 4or higher for Johnny Bates and Frank Bowerman

Please shoot me an email with scans to [url]rleonzi@sbcglobal.net[/url]

Thanks, Ray
I recently finished a Boston team set as well - good luck with finding those last 2 - Bates was my first ever T206, and Dahlen was the hardest to find for me.
